categories: Category:Starships of Darth Krayt's Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Verpine was an Imperial Ardent-class fast frigate that fought at the Battle of Mon Calamari in 137 ABY.
The Verpine served in the Outer Rim Third Fleet, and was part of the Imperial effort to destroy the Galactic Alliance Remnant forces under Admiral Gar Stazi.
It was heavily damaged in combat over Mon Calamari.
